sys_ux_client_script.name: previewRecordRouteMapping

sys_update_version.name: sys_ux_client_script_85ddd44c1bb819106a08a9b4bd4bcb12
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes>58d17acf0b531010a8b1c96237673a68</includes><macroponent display_value="Record">60dd944c1bb819106a08a9b4bd4bcbbf</macroponent><name>previewRecordRouteMapping</name><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[function handler({
    api,
    helpers,
    event,
    imports
}) {
    // Bypass dynamic routing for non "record" pages
    if (event.payload.route && event.payload.route !== 'record') {
        api.emit('NAV_ITEM_SELECTED', event.payload);
        return;
    }

    const {
        routeMapping,
        buildDefaultRoutePayload
    } = imports["global.recordRoutesMapping"]();

    var route = 'record';
    var targetRoute = 'current';
    const domainId = api.state.domainId;
    const defaultRoutePayload = buildDefaultRoutePayload(route, targetRoute, event, domainId);
    
    const routeMap = api.data.dynamic_routing_record.routeMap;
    const payload = routeMapping(routeMap, defaultRoutePayload, event, domainId);

    // If a table name passed into trueupTable matches the existing table
    // refresh trueup DR to get real table name; otherwise use existing.
    if(api.state.routeParentTables && api.state.routeParentTables.split(',').find(table => table === payload.fields.table)) {
        api.setState('navigationPayload', payload); 
        api.data.resolve_route_parent_tables.refresh(); 
    } else { 
        api.emit('NAV_ITEM_SELECTED', payload); 
    } 
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>David.Admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-07-15 00:51:38</sys_created_on><sys_id>85ddd44c1bb819106a08a9b4bd4bcb12</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>previewRecordRouteMapping</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Working From Home (WFH)" source="x_852034_wfh">ca4c5dfd1ba811106a08a9b4bd4bcb1f</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Working From Home (WFH)">ca4c5dfd1ba811106a08a9b4bd4bcb1f</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_85ddd44c1bb819106a08a9b4bd4bcb12</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>David.Admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-07-15 01:03:51</sys_updated_on><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
